entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
